title: A Gamer's Wish
description: Given the opportunity to make his dreams comes true, Henry Tsien decides to make a wish that will change his life forever. Now a newly created, low-leveled Mage in a world that has hidden secrets and histories, he'll need to find a way to survive, level up and pay his rent.  A Gamer's Wish is a GameLit novel with some game-like elements.
author: Tao Wong
